description: This table holds comparison study information for orders.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the ORDER_PROC table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMP_STUDIES_ID
columns.description: The unique order ID for studies marked as comparison studies for the current order record.  This column is frequently used to link to the ORDER_PROC table.
